info.author: thanos vassilakis
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Simple set of classes for obtaining book details from an ISBN number.
>>> import book
>>> b = book.getBook('0201342782')
>>> vars(b)
{'title': 'Constructing the User Interface with Statecharts', 'isbn':
'0201342782', 'author': 'Horrocks, Ian'}
info.name: book
info.summary: Simple module  to obtain info (online) on books by their ISBN number.
info.html_description: Simple set of classes for obtaining book details from an ISBN number. >>> import book >>> b = book.getBook(‘0201342782’) >>> vars(b) {‘title’: ‘Constructing the User Interface with Statecharts’, ‘isbn’: ‘0201342782’, ‘author’: ‘Horrocks, Ian’}
